name: Unfinished Business (Demo 2)
description:
PLAY IN FULLSCREEN

You play as a ghost who is trying to pass on to the afterlife. This demo takes place in the graveyard and the library, where you are trying to learn more about your situation and how to pass on. You can possess people and they will help you get through all the rooms to the end. Have fun!

Controls:

WASD: Movement

Space: Jump

F: Possess

Left Click/Left Ctrl: Possessed Ability (throwing a book)

E: Interacting with objects

G: Grabbing boxes

Esc: Toggle Pause Menu
